titleStmt.title: Christs kingdome discovered: or, That the true church of God is in England, cleerly made manifest against all sectaries whatsoeuer. by Iohn Traske..
titleStmt.author: Traske, John, d. ca. 1638

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho: Creede, and Bern: Alsop, for Iosias Harrison: and are to be sold in Pater noster-row, at the signe of the Golden Anker.,

notesStmt.note: Title within line border, headpieces, tailpieces, initials.

place.placeName: Pater noster-row, at the signe of the Golden Anker.
